name: Pharaoh Neko Chan's Dungeon
description:
Made for Wowie jam 3.0, My first game jam ever!

Cats have nine lives right?

Pharaoh neko chan does, probably that's because of his trusty little magical dagger.

Help Pharaoh neko chan to get out of the dungeon so he can conquer the whole world!

CONTROLS

W - Jump

A - Left

D - Right

SPACE - Use dagger

ESC - Escape to the main menu

Pharaoh neko chan's dagger offers him nine chances to live again.

Press SPACE to use the dagger, dagger allows Neko chan to live again while leaving his mortal shell behind.

Use these dead bodies to avoid hazards or to trigger switches.

Embalming fluid, bandages and mummification charges included, no extra fees to be paid!

Be careful, cats only have nine lives!

Game made by: Bigdwarf43

Tileset used: https://kronbits.itch.io/inca-game-assets

Music used:

"Ambience, Creepy Wind, A.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org
